segments.text: The water from the faucet is gushing out non-stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the sink and spilling over the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the puddle to grow so fast on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has one foot in it, but she's calmly drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her right, dishes are stacked neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How contrasting with the indoor flood!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy is climbing the stool towards the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open, and he's grabbing some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool looks unsteady, legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is there, hand up, expecting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how they're sneaking this without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR
